maze.logic

Class Dragon

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Creature
      • maze.logic.Dragon

  • public class Dragon
extends Creature
    Represents a dragon in-game.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dragon()
      Default constructor in which the dragon is still.
      Dragon(Dragon.Mode mode)
      If chosen mode is STILL, the dragon won't move.

    • Field Detail

      • asleep

        private boolean asleep

      • mode

        private Dragon.Mode mode

      • in

        private java.util.Random in

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dragon

        public Dragon()
        Default constructor in which the dragon is still.

      • Dragon

        public Dragon(Dragon.Mode mode)
        If chosen mode is STILL, the dragon won't move. RANDOM means it'll move randomly. RANDOM_ASLEEP means it'll move randomly, and may fall asleep as well.
        Parameters:
        mode - Mode that'll choose the dragon's behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • getAsleep

        public boolean getAsleep()
        Returns:
        True if Dragon is asleep. False otherwise.

      • getMode

        public Dragon.Mode getMode()
        Returns:
        STILL if Dragon is idle, RANDOM if Dragon moves randomly, RANDOM_ASLEEP if Dragon moves randomly but starts asleep.

      • updateAsleep

        public void updateAsleep(boolean asleep)
        Parameters:
        asleep - New sleep Status(true if asleep, false if awake) of the Dragon.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(char dragonMode)
        Receives a char, given by the player ate the beginning of the game, to set dragon's mode.
        Parameters:
        dragonMode - Char given by player.

      • newPosition

        public void newPosition(Maze maze)
        Updates dragons position according to its mode and its surroundings. It does not print the dragon.
        Parameters:
        maze - Game's maze.

      • checkPosition

        private boolean checkPosition(Position newPos,
                              Maze maze)
        Checks whether or not a new dragon position is valid in the current maze state.
        Parameters:
        newPos - Dragon's new position.
        maze - Game's maze.
        Returns:
        True if the new position is valid. False otherwise.

      • randomPosition

        private Position randomPosition(Maze maze)
        Randomly generates a new dragon position that is adjacent or equal to the previous one.
        Parameters:
        maze - Game's maze.
        Returns:
        The generated position.

      • setRandomAsleep

        private void setRandomAsleep()
        Updates dragon's asleep state randomly, meaning he may wake up or fall asleep.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
